title: Blame Canada
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar and restaurant at Otres Beach operated by expats. Menu marks what's vegan or vegetarian. Could get fried noodles with tofu, fried rice with veggies and tofu, Cambodian poutine (amok curry with tofu, contains cheese), sweet and sour tofu and rice, taco salad, bean or tofu burrito.
